nodes.title: Nano Banana Pro
widgets_values:
Google Nano Banana Pro delivers sharper 2K imagery, intelligent 4K scaling.

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/nano-banana-pro](https://kie.ai/nano-banana-pro)

- Aspect Ratio: 9:16 etc
- Resolution 1K, 2K, 4K

Output format: png or jpg

**Pricing (May change):**
- 1K/2K 18 credits (~$0.09) 
- 4K 24 credits (~$0.12)

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: JSON Output
widgets_values:
{
  "model": "kling-3.0/video",
  "input": {
    "mode": "std",
    "multi_shots": false,
    "prompt": "Use the provided image as a visual anchor.
Preserve facial identity, skin texture, hairstyle, body proportions, and lighting.

A bright tropical beach with soft waves and palm trees in the background.
Warm sunlight reflects off the sand.
Light ocean breeze moves her hair.

A young woman lies comfortably on the sand, facing the camera.
A cold can rests beside her.

The camera begins in a relaxed medium close-up, slightly handheld, like a casual vlog.

She shifts slightly closer to the camera and smiles.

She reaches for the can and lifts it, looking at it briefly.

[Woman, relaxed upbeat voice]:
“Honestly, this tech moves so fast… it’s wild trying to keep up sometimes. Shout out to Steve for making me come alive!”

She brings the can to her lips and takes a quick drink.

Condensation glistens in the sunlight.

She lowers it, smiles at the camera, and laughs softly.

The camera gently pushes in.
Ocean ambience plays quietly.

Natural pacing.
Authentic social-media creator style.
",
    "sound": true,
    "duration": "10",
    "image_urls": [
      "https://tempfile.redpandaai.co/kieai/183531/images/user-uploads/1770815021068-of3be47x2zn.png"
    ],
    "aspect_ratio": "9:16"
  }
}

nodes.title: Validation Data
widgets_values:
VALID: Kling 3.0 preflight checks passed.
No createTask call was made.
Mode: std
Multi-shots: True
Duration sent: 12s
Frame inputs resolved: 1
Aspect ratio in payload: 9:16
Elements provided: 2
Shot count: 3
Element names: element_kling, element_sadi

Use the provided image as a visual anchor.
Preserve facial identity, skin texture, hairstyle, body proportions, and lighting.

A bright tropical beach with soft waves and palm trees in the background.
Warm sunlight reflects off the sand.
Light ocean breeze moves her hair.

A young woman lies comfortably on the sand, facing the camera.
A cold can rests beside her.

The camera begins in a relaxed medium close-up, slightly handheld, like a casual vlog.

She shifts slightly closer to the camera and smiles.

She reaches for the can and lifts it, looking at it briefly.

[Woman, relaxed upbeat voice]:
“Honestly, this tech moves so fast… it’s wild trying to keep up sometimes. Shout out to Steve for making me come alive!”

She brings the can to her lips and takes a quick drink.

Condensation glistens in the sunlight.

She lowers it, smiles at the camera, and laughs softly.

The camera gently pushes in.
Ocean ambience plays quietly.

Natural pacing.
Authentic social-media creator style.

Analyze the provided reference images carefully.

Image Reference 1 contains the woman’s face and facial identity.
Image Reference 2 contains the woman’s body, posture, proportions, and outfit.

When generating the final prompt:

- Apply the exact facial structure, skin tone, eye shape, nose, lips, and expression from Image Reference 1.
- Apply the body shape, height, proportions, pose, and clothing from Image Reference 2.
- Merge both references into one consistent character.
- Do not alter identity, ethnicity, or facial features.
- Do not beautify, stylize, or modify proportions.

Preserve realistic human skin texture:
visible pores, fine lines, natural highlights, subtle imperfections.
No plastic skin.
No airbrushed look.
No artificial smoothing.

Use both references as ground truth anchors, image ref 2 is only used for the actual body shape not the clothing.

---

Generate a detailed Nano Banana image prompt featuring:

A dystopian sci-fi city environment inspired by Blade Runner.
Neon lights, rain, fog, holographic signs, reflective streets.
Industrial architecture and cyberpunk atmosphere.

The woman stands in the center of the scene.
She is surrounded by several futuristic warriors in tactical armor yoga outfit style clothing.
They are preparing for combat.
Tension fills the air.

Cinematic lighting.
Moody shadows.
High dynamic range.
Volumetric light through rain and smoke.

The woman appears calm, focused, and battle-ready.

Camera:
Medium-wide cinematic shot.
Slight low angle.
Shallow depth of field.
Subject in sharp focus.

Lighting:
Neon rim light.
Soft ambient glow.
Realistic reflections on skin and clothing.

Style:
Photorealistic.
High detail.
8k quality.
Professional cinematic photography.

---

Output only the final Nano Banana prompt.
Do not include analysis or explanations.
Do not describe the references.
Do not mention “image reference” in the final prompt.

2x2 grid with json output

A dystopian sci-fi abandoned industrial building inspired by Blade Runner.
Cracked concrete walls, broken windows, flickering neon signs, holographic debris, exposed cables, damaged machinery, steam vents, glowing screens, rain leaking through ceiling gaps.

Broken technology, wires, and ruined terminals scattered on the floor.
Dust, smoke, and light beams in the air.

Lighting is moody and cinematic:
neon rim lights,
cold blue and orange highlights,
volumetric fog,
deep shadows.

Environment remains identical in all frames.
images: Grid Visual Director (Real Camera - Influencer Style)

Use the provided opening and closing images as visual anchors.
Preserve the woman’s identity, clothing, and environment throughout.

An abandoned concrete building filled with dust and broken windows.
Sunlight cuts through the air in thin beams.
The floor is covered in debris and shattered glass.

A woman in a black tank top and black tactical pants stands in the center of the room, breathing steadily facing off with one man in the room.

The camera begins in a wide shot, circling the group.
Tension builds in the silence.

One attacker suddenly charges.
The woman blocks his strike and counters with a sharp elbow.
She spins, dodges, and moves between the others with precision.

The camera shifts between tight close-ups and fast tracking shots, following her movement.
Punches land.
Bodies crash into walls.
Dust rises with every impact.

She ducks under a swing, grabs an opponent, and throws him hard to the ground.
Another attacker rushes from behind.
She pivots and delivers a powerful kick.

Breathing grows heavier.
Footsteps echo.
Music slowly intensifies.

The camera briefly slows as she lands the final strike.
The last man collapses.

Silence returns.

The camera slowly pushes in as all three men lie unconscious around her.
She stands in the center, bruised and exhausted, but calm.

Her eyes lift toward the camera.
A faint confident smile appears.

22 year old sexy woman, dark hair, blue eyes and pale skin,  concise physical identity only
aluminum beverage can, white-and-green label, 330ml, realistic reflections

shot 1 | 4 | Wide Thailand beach shot. @element_sadi lies on the sand facing camera. She slowly pushes herself up to a seated position. A cold @element_kling can rests beside her hand. She notices it and smiles. Sunlight highlights her face. Camera gently pushes in.

shot 2 | 4 | Medium close-up from the front. @element_sadi picks up the @element_kling can and holds it toward the camera, showing the label clearly. Condensation beads on the surface. She smiles playfully. Light ocean breeze moves her hair. Shallow depth of field.

shot 3 | 4 | Medium shot facing @element_sadi  She brings the @element_kling can to her lips and takes a small sip. She lowers it and looks directly into the lens. [warm relaxed voice]: “There’s nothing like sitting on a beach in Thailand with a drink like this.” She laughs softly. Camera holds steady.
